Package domain

Class Summary
AIControlled This class represents a game entity wich is controlled by it's artificial intelligence implementation.
Animated This Specialitzation class represents a Sprite wich has the ability of moving.
Calculator  
Collisions This utility class implements methods for detecting collisions, detecting Collisionable instances in determinated areas, detecting visible Collisionable instances for a determinated Collisionable, etc.
Configuration This class holds all the configuration managers for the GameClient instance.
Controls This class acts as the controls manager. it's the responsible of mapping the FiredAction from the FiredActionable instances of the Environment to the Events received from the GameEngine.
DinamicEnvironment This class is intended to be an Environment specialitzation in wich the Scenario dimensions are bigger as the GameFrame dimension or GameApplet dimension, and so on the Scenario instance should take care of implementig its render method to get only the screenvisible region rendered.
Display This class will act as the Display configuration manager in a further release.
Environment This class acts as the Environment wich contains all the game interacting instances.
GameClient This class acts as the GameClient.
ImagesManager This class is the responsible of managing the images of the game.
Inanimated This Specialitzation class represents a Sprite wich will never have the ability of moving.
Media This class acts as the media manager for all the Sprite instances of the game.
Menu  
OffLine This class will act as an Offline GameClient instance.
OnLine This class will act as an Online GameClient instance in further releases.
Paths  
PerCoordinatesDinamicEnvironment  
PerCoordinatesStaticEnvironment  
Phisics  
Player  
Scenario This class represents the game Scenario.
Sound This class will act as the Sound configuration manager in a further release.
SoundsManager This class is the responsible of managing the sounds of the game.
Sprite This class acts as a game entity wich should be updated and rendered.
StaticEnvironment This class is intended to be an Environment specialitzation in wich the Scenario dimensions are the same as the GameFrame dimension or GameApplet dimension.
Tile  
TiledDinamicEnvironment  
TiledStaticEnvironment  
UserControlled  
 

Enum Summary
Collisions.CollisionDirection Enumeration containing possible collision directions, where the ANY value can be used to specify all of them.
Collisions.CollisionType Enumeration containing various generic collision types
Paths.Direction  
Sprite.ON_SCREEN_POSITION Enumeration holding diferent standart kinds of positioning.
